Package org.hlacerti.lib

Cosimulation between HLA/CERTI and Ptolemy II.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutomaticSimulation
    Implement an automatic simulation of any model chosen by the user.
    CertiRtig
    Execute the HLA/CERTI RTIG in a subprocess.
    HlaManager
    This class implements a HLA Manager which allows a Ptolemy model to cooperate with a HLA/CERTI Federation.
    HlaPublisher
    This actor implements a publisher in a HLA/CERTI federation.
    HlaSubscriber
    This actor implements a subscriber in a HLA/CERTI federation.
    MessageProcessing
    Deals with message processing.
    OriginatedEvent
    Extension to add to an TimedEvent in oder to give to the HLASubscriber the object's id which is reponsible for the update.
    StructuralInformation
    Utility class for storing all we need to know about a given class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HlaManager.ETimeManagementService
    The two options for time advancement service (NER or TAR).

Package org.hlacerti.lib Description

Cosimulation between HLA/CERTI and Ptolemy II.

Since:
Ptolemy II 8.1
